health_discussed_people_names: Hon. Ogutu, Hon. Abdulrahman Abdulkadir, Hon. Hassan Mohamed, Hon. Katana, Hon. Ojala, Hon. Kibwana Swaleh
health_data_challenges: Lack of development in certain wards, poor working conditions for environmental workers, issues in the health sector leading to child mortality, concerns about education and higher education loan board removal
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Implementation of Ward Development Funds, improvement in environmental workers' conditions, establishment of task force for health issues
health_evidence_base: Cases of child mortality due to negligence, challenges in the education sector
